title: DEPL-1: Deployment Infrastructure
description: Core deployment scripts and automation for template system

title: SIDE-1: Sidecar Validation
description: Testing and validation of sidecar deployment pattern

title: Claude Swift as root, with sub project work bench
description: Transform claude-swift into a root workspace framework that manages multiple sub-projects. Core features: PROJECT_SWITCH workflow for seamless project switching, GitHub repository cloning automation, and independent project contexts within a unified development environment. Claude-swift WoW (Ways of Working) workflows are seamlessly activated in all sub-projects using symlinks, providing consistent operational framework across the entire workspace.
